biotools.summary: VarSum is an API that returns summary statistics on user-defined populations and their variants, using the genomic data repository maintained by the genomic computing group (GeCo) at Politecnico di Milano.

bioschemas.name: VarSum
bioschemas.summary: VarSum is an API that returns summary statistics on user-defined populations and their variants, using the genomic data repository maintained by the genomic computing group (GeCo) at Politecnico di Milano.
